By becoming accountability partners, you will both be able to:

‚Ä¢ View each other's progress and streaks
‚Ä¢ Send nudges and cheers to motivate each other

This helps you both stay consistent and accountable.

trial.how_works_q: How does the free trial work?
trial.how_works_a: When you subscribe to an annual plan, you get a 3-day free trial. During this time, you have full access to all premium features. You won't be charged until the trial ends.
trial.charged_q: Will I be charged during the free trial?
trial.charged_a: No, you won't be charged anything during your 3-day free trial. Your subscription payment is only processed after the trial period ends. You can cancel anytime before the trial ends to avoid being charged.
trial.cancel_q: Can I cancel during the free trial?
trial.cancel_a: Yes, you can cancel anytime during your free trial and you won't be charged. To cancel, go to your device's subscription settings (App Store or Google Play Store). After canceling, you'll still have access until the trial ends.

billing.when_charged_a: For trial subscriptions, you'll be charged when your 3-day trial ends. For non-trial subscriptions, you're charged immediately upon subscribing. Your subscription automatically renews at the end of each billing period unless you cancel.
billing.cancel_q: How do I cancel my subscription?
billing.cancel_a:
To cancel your subscription:

‚Ä¢ iOS: Go to Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions > FitNudge > Cancel Subscription
‚Ä¢ Android: Go to Google Play Store > Menu > Subscriptions > FitNudge > Cancel Subscription

You'll retain access until the end of your current billing period.
billing.refund_a: Refund policies are managed by Apple (iOS) or Google (Android). For iOS, contact Apple Support. For Android, request a refund through Google Play within 48 hours of purchase. We're happy to help if you have issues - contact our support team.
billing.change_plan_q: Can I switch from monthly to yearly?
billing.change_plan_a:
Yes! You can upgrade from monthly to yearly at any time:

‚Ä¢ iOS: Go to Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions > FitNudge > Choose the yearly plan
‚Ä¢ Android: Go to Play Store > Menu > Subscriptions > FitNudge > Update

The change takes effect at the end of your current billing period.

features.included_a: Premium includes: unlimited active goals, AI Coach chat for personalized advice, weekly AI-generated progress recaps, advanced analytics, accountability partners, and priority support. Check the subscription screen for the complete feature list.
features.lose_data_q: Do I lose my data if I cancel?
features.lose_data_a: Your goals, check-ins, and progress history are never deleted when you cancel. Free users retain access to one active goal.

technical.restore_q: How do I restore my purchase?
technical.restore_a: If you've previously purchased a subscription and it's not showing, tap 'Restore Purchases' on the subscription screen. Make sure you're signed in with the same Apple ID or Google account you used for the original purchase.
technical.not_working_q: Why am I not seeing Premium features after purchase?
technical.not_working_a: First, try closing and reopening the app. If the issue persists, tap 'Restore Purchases' on the subscription screen. Make sure you have an active internet connection. If problems continue, contact our support team.
technical.multi_device_q: Does my subscription work across devices?
technical.multi_device_a: Yes! Your subscription is tied to your Apple ID (iOS) or Google account (Android) and works on all devices where you're signed in with the same account. Note: Subscriptions don't transfer between iOS and Android.
